document.discussion_title: Midlands Broadcaster Steve Patterson Dies | wltx.com
document.topic_text: Midlands Broadcaster Steve Patterson Dies Longtime radio broadcaster dies at 67 wltx 10:27 PM. EST August 11, 2016 Steve Patterson CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST Columbia, SC (WLTX) - A longtime Midlands broadcaster has died. Steve Patterson was not a voice on the radio; instead, he was an important figure behind the scenes. Over the last 30 years or so, Patterson managed a number of local radio stations, including WWDM/The Big DM. A cause of death hasn't been given, and funeral arrangements are still pending. Patterson was 67.
